data.quote: We ought to walk through the rooms of our lives not looking for flaws, but looking for potential.
data.author: Ellen Goodman

data.quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual you will have to settle for the ordinary.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Opportunities don’t happen, you create them.
data.author: Chris Grosser

data.quote: Try not to become a person of success, but rather try to become a person of value.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work.
data.author: Thomas A. Edison

data.quote: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.
data.author: Oscar Wilde

data.quote: The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success.
data.author: Bruce Feirstein

data.quote: When you stop chasing the wrong things you give the right things a chance to catch you.
data.author: Lolly Daskal

data.quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
data.author: John D. Rockefeller

data.quote: In my experience, there is only one motivation, and that is desire. No reasons or principle contain it or stand against it.
data.author: Jane Smiley

data.quote: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.
data.author: Michael Jordan

data.quote: People rarely succeed unless they have fun in what they are doing.
data.author: Dale Carnegie

data.quote: There is no chance, no destiny, no fate, that can hinder or control the firm resolve of a determined soul.
data.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

data.quote: Our greatest fear should not be of failure but of succeeding at things in life that don’t really matter.
data.author: Francis Chan

data.quote: You’ve got to get up every morning with determination if you’re going to go to bed with satisfaction.
data.author: George Lorimer

data.quote: To be successful you must accept all challenges that come your way. You can’t just accept the ones you like.
data.author: Mike Gafka

data.quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream, not only plan, but also believe.
data.author: Anatole France
